```{r echo=F, message=F, warning=F}
## Publications
library(googlesheets4)
library(tidyverse)
googlesheets4::gs4_deauth()

data_url <- 'https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1zSHLGGOSBIOgN3BXXGl2jPtJLBF6OExAznjqmRnzrTY/edit?usp=sharing'

# inject publication cards
publication_cards <-
  googlesheets4::read_sheet(ss = data_url, sheet = 'publications') |> 
  dplyr::mutate(
    dplyr::across(where(is.character), ~stringr::str_remove(., '\\.$')),
    vol_issue_pages = if_else(
      is.na(vol_issue_pages),
      '', 
      paste0(vol_issue_pages, '.\n')
    ),
    text = paste0(
      paste0(authors, '.\n'), 
      paste0(journal, '.\n'),
      paste0(year, '. '),
      vol_issue_pages
    )
  ) |> 
  arrange(desc(year), desc(row_number())) |> 
  bs4cards::cards(
    title = title,
    text = text,
    link = link,
    footer = doi,
    border_width = 1,
    border_colour = '#afafaf',
    width = 5,
    spacing = 3
  )

# inject media cards
media_cards <-
  googlesheets4::read_sheet(
    ss = data_url, 
    sheet = 'media',
    col_types = 'ccccc'
    ) |> 
  dplyr::mutate(
    image = ifelse(
      stringr::str_detect(image, '^http'),
      image,
      paste0('./public/img/media/', image)
    )) |> 
  bs4cards::cards(
    title = title,
    image = image,
    text = text,
    link = link,
    footer = footer,
    layout = 'label-below',
    border_width = 1,
    border_colour = '#afafaf',
    width = 4,
    spacing = 3
  )
```
